name: global-search

search_tables.description: Array of CMDB tables to search on. If not defined, global search function will do a search on all tables that the current user has read permission on. E.g ['firewall.address', 'firewall.address6'].

skip_tables.description: Array of CMDB tables to be skipped when doing global search. E.g. ['firewall.address', 'firewall.address6'].

exact.description: If true, only entries with exact match will be returned.

GET.summary:
Search for CMDB table objects based on search phrase.
Access Group: any

help: Search for CMDB table objects based on search phrase.

pathname.name: pathname
pathname.title: CMDB Path Name
pathname.description: The CMDB path name to which the object belongs to.

weight.name: weight
weight.title: Search Weight
weight.description: Numerical score based on what properties the CMDB object has matched with the search phrase.

matched_properties.name: matched_properties
matched_properties.title: Matched Properties
matched_properties.description: Array of CMDB object's properties that matched with the search phrase.

response_description: Retrieve a list of weighted search result of CMDB object primary keys, path, name, and matched properties based on a search phrase.

search_tables.name: search_tables
search_tables.summary: Array of CMDB tables to search on. If not defined, global search function will do a search on all tables that the current user has read permission on. E.g ['firewall.address', 'firewall.address6'].

skip_tables.name: skip_tables
skip_tables.summary: Array of CMDB tables to be skipped when doing global search. E.g. ['firewall.address', 'firewall.address6'].

exact.name: exact
exact.summary: If true, only entries with exact match will be returned.
